text: Härnösands AIK is a sports club in the town of Härnösand in Sweden. It was established in 1945 and originally thought to be called BK Virgo. However the club was required to change name because the other name was already in use. The club plays bandy. Earlier the club also ran soccer, track and field athletics, skiing and table tennis. The men's bandy team played in the Swedish top division during the season of 1984-1985. The women's bandy team has played several seasons in the Swedish top division. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1945 establishments in Sweden Category:Athletics clubs in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Ski clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs Category:Table tennis clubs in Sweden
title: Härnösands AIK
